title: ECOPEACE brings water quality management robots to Singapore and the UAE
description:
ECOPEACE has deployed its ECOBOT autonomous cleanup systems across reservoirs, rivers, urban parks, and smart-city districts in Korea.

The post ECOPEACE brings water quality management robots to Singapore and the UAE appeared first on The Robot Report.
